A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left my first viewing of TLJ feeling extremely conflicted. I let the film settle for a few days and was leaning more towards the negative side of the spectrum. But then I took my wife to see it the following Sunday and wow\, I was blown away. The issues I had seen before melted away\, I understood narrative decisions better\, and I came to terms with some of the conclusions of the film. I even got teary at one point\, and completely lost it at another point. Bravo\, Rian. Thanks for taking Star Wars in a brave new direction.
